comment_text: His regulators CBI, ED.... raid the opposition to put them in jail and the rich to make them buy some other sort of EB... wonder if he even thinks of the country for a minute in a day... busy flagging of trains... very soon his photo will be printed on TP too. This man has lost his bearings. Can he disclose how he paid all those MLAs to topple state governments, going rate Rs 50 cr for each... Bhakts think it was by RTGS.
sir bank manager manjakote wala mera case nahi karta PMEGP sir mera help karo ma un employment hu

Very timely and forceful direction from Hon’ble Prime Minister. Despite multiple efforts from our cyber experts, incidents of cyber crime are not decreasing, rather the fraudesters are enhancing their capabilities and expanding in new fields of operation like e-commerce and post offices etc. Therefore our cyber experts and regulators need to develop new technologies and make strategies for curbing the menace more effectively.
S K Mishra
Dwarka, New Delhi

replies.comment_text: what about SEBI why no comments by feku PM on this

Cyber fraudsters are openly scamming, thousands of 'call centres' paying bjp chanda and going on. PM ji is the biggest fraudster himself...always lies and jhumla. LoPappu is the best opposition we have. God save us

comment_text: sir is number pr. call karna
Ban any cash withdrawal above 5000 per day. Force everything via UPI or banking channels.

1.Modi is helpless/useless in preventing cyber frauds in India .Cyber frauds increased many times in the Modi regime only .It is a permanent black mark
2.cyber crimes damage public confidence in banks/financial institutions
2.Twi lacs cyber crimes reported in India per year
3.A Few accused only are identified/punished 80% escape U live happily This is drawback of cyber /computer technology.
4.The fraudsters operate from neighbouring country/south east asis/Asia .Indian police have no control .Investigation is delayed in many cases police no. cooperation.Cirruptikn a side factor .
5 Public are ultimate sufferers in cyber fraud issues OM /ministers accounts are safe customers accounts only are affected
6 Digital literaç.cy is doing more harm than good .It is also encouraging laziness/mental agony.
7 Net banking/mobile banking/G pay /PPay are nuisance

Anyway well read from the tele prompter..

A prominent private sector bank is blatantly indulging in Cyber Crimes in nexus with Government of India ministries and departments.
National Informatic Centre has on three occassions advised me to make formal complaint to Law Enforcement Agency and also National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal.
Formal complaint has been submitted to CBI and also National Cyber Crime Reporing Portal against the bank. Their response is awaited.
IT IS ALSO KNOWN THAT THERE IS NO FREE LUNCH.
Hlo

Amazon service has badly degraded. Its arrive without proper packing and usually brocken or parts missing. Then they are not returnable and customer service sucks. Returned items (usually defective) are reshipped without checking is another problem. They will die a natural death soon.
Don't pay tell them to collect it back.
Reservation drives top Indian talent abroad

replies.comment_text: No, congress is the big reason for brain drain.

comment_text: Since our Pappu is going to USA and his favourite (close to heart) subject is Distribution of wealth based on caste pupolations (after census), he should tallk on the same subject there. From the names, none of the CEOs in US seems to be from his favourite Strata - including Jihad-cultists, and none seem to be even Dalit or Yadav. He needs to talk to Kamala and also law makers an make a demand that 'Do whatever with others.. but when it is PIO you MUST follow Indian reservation system... in recruitment, in promotions and especially in Appointement as CEO - NO COMPROMISE" ... He has to make a strong point, and in fact put his foot down on this subject.

replies.comment_text: They have inheritance law in place already in USA.

USA doesn't ahve inheritanec tax. Unlike what Tool-kit claims, ONLY a few states in USA has it and that too is not as Various P G Wodehose (and otehr novels) show... that a Millionaire's sole beneficiary got only a efw hundred $. Probably nowhere even in THESE FEW states the tax is more than 20%. ANyway that is not in the context, since even this fraction is not used to 'Distribute' in 'Other castes' based on their populaion.

comment_text: Thanks to Modiji, Indians are also getting die recognition. There were zero Indian CEOs before 2014 let alone highest paid. Modiji ki Jai!

replies.comment_text: The brainless pre-nursery tremite with the garbage. Instead of feeling proud the Termites feel jeaolous, and also needs to bring noncontextual politics into it... wonder when this scater-braiend infant will grow? WIll it or remain Pappu even when 70, like the REAL Pappu?

True, public company CEOs are political positions. It has nothing to do with talent but more of obedience to certain political leaders and certain set of rich people. Monopolies does not grow in Capitalist countries. Monopoly is a Socialist country thing. Growing Power of monopoly is the measure of increase in unethical humans in that country.

comment_text: Fix the spelling mistakes of their names on the first line itself. This is shameful for an English newspaper.
Congratulations Nikesh, Yamini, Shantanu, Pichai. Keep it up, you are Role model for many young Hindustanis 🙏 🙏

Relevant question is: how have they used their wealth to help poor people or social causes or issues for women or environment; in India or in USA or anywhete in the world ? Bill and Melinda Gates or Warren Buffet have used their wealth to help causes all over the world.

We should not get too excited with Indians being made CEO of companies in west because in majority cases their agenda is to capture indian market. Western countries have not invested much in India, where maximum growth is expected in this century.
